articles.content: Six-times world champion Lewis Hamilton has dominated the Styrian Grand Prix in a Mercedes one-two to celebrate his 85th Formula 1 win and move a step closer to Michael Schumacher's record of 91 vict… [+5804 chars]

articles.title: On the brink: Last-gasp winner puts Leeds United on verge of 16-year Premier League return - Fox Sports
articles.description: Pablo Hernandez fired Leeds to within touching distance of the Premier League as his late strike gave the Championship leaders a 1-0 win at Swansea on Sunday.
articles.content:
Former Swansea midfielder Hernandez left it late to keep Leeds on course for automatic promotion.
The Spaniard netted in the 89th minute, controlling Luke Aylings cross to roll the ball home off a p… [+2214 chars]

articles.title: Huawei is the 'most unfairly maligned' company in Australian history: Xenophon - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
Former Independent Senator Nick Xenophon says there is a double standard over the treatment of Huawei given Telstra’s equipment is provided by a Chinese state-owned electronics company.

Australia excluded Huawei from the rolling out of its 5G infrastructure,…

articles.title: Round 9 charges: Latrell, Reynolds out, Nicholls, Smith facing bans - NRL.COM
articles.description: All the official charges from the match review committee for Round 9 of the Telstra Premiership.
articles.content:
Rabbitohs star Latrell Mitchell has taken the early guilty plea for both of his charges from Friday night meaning he will be out for the next two weeks.
